summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4125 for the improvement of West 64th Street, from 11th Avenue Northwest to 14th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49435, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
